SEARCH
Package org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.utils.result

Interface Attempt<T,F extends FailureReason>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the value.
F - The type of failure reason.
All Known Implementing Classes:
Attempt.Failure, Attempt.Success
public sealed interface Attempt<T,F extends FailureReason> permits Attempt.Success<T,F>, Attempt.Failure<T,F>
Represents an attempt to process a value that can fail with a reason that has a localized message.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static final class 
    Attempt.Failure<T,F extends FailureReason>
    Represents a failed attempt with a reason.
    static final class 
    Attempt.Success<T,F extends FailureReason>
    Represents a successful attempt with a value.

      Parameters:
      failureReason - The reason for failure.
      messageReplacements - The replacements for the failure message.

    • failure

      static <T, F extends FailureReason> Attempt<T,F> failure(F failureReason, Message message)
      Creates a new failure attempt with a custom message.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the value.
      F - The type of failure reason.
      Parameters:
      failureReason - The reason for failure.
      message - The custom message for failure. This will override the default message.
      Returns:
      The new failure attempt.

      Gets the value of this attempt. Exceptions will be thrown if this is a failure attempt.
